chorus.text: E-gloria, gloria (2X) Gloria nkembo ee gloria Na zulu nkembo ee gloria Mpe na toto ndebama ee gloria
chorus.label: Ch.

verses: Oo na zulu (uu) nkembo Na nzambe tata (aa) nkembo (2X) Yina salaka betu (uu) nkembo
Oo na zulu (uu) nkembo Na nzambe nwana (aa) nkembo (2X) Yina kalaka betu (uu) nkembo
Oo na zulu (uu) nkembo Wa mpere Santu (uu) nkembo (2X) Yina Nzobe Yaba atu (uu) nkembo
